title: All That Remains
overview: A middle-aged rock drummer puts his career on hold to care for his estranged father, newly diagnosed with a form of hallucinatory dementia. While there, he discovers a dark family secret: his parents used their children as cover to smuggle artworks out of Russian-occupied Czechoslovakia. Now, he must extract the story from his father of their role in the 1989 Czech Revolution before the truth is lost forever.
